sentence: Warnock, chosen by voters in a special election, is on the ballot again this year in a high-profile race that could pit him against Trump's choice for the Republican nomination, the former football star Herschel Walker.
author: Fredreka Schouten
title: Plans to close all but one polling place in a rural Georgia county reverberate through a battleground state

sentence: You can even tell your smart speaker to play Politically Georgia podcast.? Weve uncovered audio of Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walkers speech to a private closed-door fundraiser in Texas earlier this month where he makes broad statements about climate change.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: See Sonny Perdues resume for his new $524,000 job as chancellor
